name: RemoveGuestFromTask
description:
Revoke a guest's access to a specific task in ClickUp.

Use this tool to remove a guest from a task in ClickUp. This action is available only for Workspaces on the Enterprise Plan.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task from which the guest's access should be revoked. This is required to specify the task.

parameters.name: guest_id
parameters.description: The ID of the guest to remove from the task. This is a required integer value.

parameters.name: workspace_id_for_custom_task
parameters.description: Provide the Workspace ID when referencing a task by its custom task ID. This is required if 'custom_task_ids' is set to 'true'.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: include_shared_details
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include details of items shared with the guest. Default is `true`.

value_schema.description: Exclude details of items shared with the guest by setting this parameter to `false`. By default this parameter is set to `true`.

parameters.name: use_custom_task_ids
parameters.description: Set to true to reference a task by its custom task ID.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: include_shared
parameters.description: Exclude details of items shared with the guest by setting this parameter to `false`. By default this parameter is set to `true`.

value_schema.description: Exclude details of items shared with the guest by setting this parameter to `false`. By default this parameter is set to `true`.

parameters.name: custom_task_ids
parameters.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
